definition: process of identifying a user attempting to connect to a system
granting object privileges to users based on their identities.
clause is used to restrict the groups returned by a query
function determines how widely data is spread in a group.  Calculated based on the minimum and maximum values for a specified field.  If the data values are clustered together closely, it is small.
The component on which the other GROUP BY extensions, ROLLUP and CUBE are built.
